tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to exposure of sensitive system information. Sensitive keys such as `NX_CLOUD_ENCRYPTION_KEY` (e2e encryption token) or `NX_CLOUD_ACCESS_TOKEN` (access token to the cloud CI solution), when set in the environment variables, can be exposed during the bundling process.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package >=12.3.5 and <= 18.1.2 and NX_CLOUD_ENCRYPTION_KEY or NX_CLOUD_ACCESS_TOKEN are set in the environment variables
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `nx` library to the patch version or remove NX_CLOUD_ENCRYPTION_KEY and NX_CLOUD_ACCESS_TOKEN from the environment variables.
